# 𒃣 ama5 < Heim 𓉔 𓉧 < chamber < 𒂷 GA2

𒃣 home ≈ house in

𒃣 home < chamber < 𒂍𒈪 𒀉𒈪 ᵏa₂mi ᵏama₅ Kammer 𒂍𒈪 ᵏe₂MI ≈ 𓆎 khem

𒃣 home < hwom < womb :

𒃣 arhuš 𒀉𒌉 𒀉𒊩 "womb …" ( 𒀉 arm ≈ 𒃣 ama ) ⇔ house

𒂷 گھر горт 𐌲𐌰𐍂𐌳 gort घर गृह gare chamber casa > 𓉔 house home yard
𒃣 mansion ⇔ mun 𒊩

𒃣;𒉦;𒉥 uš₃;uš₅;uš₆ uš membrane; womb; afterbirth

𒂼 𒀀𒌅 ama-a-tud ama-tu "house-born slave" #dušmû wardu Wart< guard
𒀫𒃮 amar-gaba "a designation of children of female workers"

𒃣 ama5 ⇔ 𒂼 ama Oma / mama
